enchantment.zweihander.repulsion.desc: Blocking with a shield knocks enemies back
enchantment.zweihander.weight.desc: Увеличивает отдачу в зависимости от скорости
enchantment.zweihander.poise.desc: Увеличивает сопротивление отбрасыванию и твердость брони, получаемые после нанесения удара
enchantment.zweihander.curse_of_chaos.de: Увеличивает урон, наносимый игрокам,на 25%, но уменьшает остальной наносимый урон на 50%
enchantment.zweihander.trooper.desc: Melee kills with a musket instantly reload it
enchantment.zweihander.assault.desc: Increases step height and movement speed while sprinting with loaded musket in hand
enchantment.zweihander.scattershot.desc: Reduces musket's accuracy and damage while making it fire another shot
enchantment.zweihander.rifling.desc: Increases musket's range and accuracy, reduces damage. Damage increases with shot's range
enchantment.zweihander.coalescence.desc: Tales of Void calls upon a rain of powerful slowness
Tales of Void conjures a vortex upon its user that brings in enemies
enchantment.zweihander.mariners_rime.des: Tales of Void turns its user into a void potential to dash forth
enchantment.zweihander.northern_fleet.de: Abyssal Anchor's critical strikes share the damage across nearby enemies and apply cold to them
enchantment.zweihander.crushing_depths.d: Abyssal Anchor grows in power with consecutive strikes, critical strikes release the accumulated power
enchantment.zweihander.devils_roar.desc: Abyssal Anchor's critical strikes create geysers that launch enemies
